org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.server

Class GremlinServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.server.GremlinServer

  • public class GremlinServer
extends Object
    Start and stop Gremlin Server.
    Author:
    Stephen Mallette (http://stephen.genoprime.com)

      • stop

        public CompletableFuture<Void> stop()
        Stop Gremlin Server and free the port binding. Note that multiple calls to this method will return the same instance of the CompletableFuture.
